name: Biscotti
description: Indulge in our crunchy Biscotti, filled with aromatic almonds and a hint of vanilla, perfect for dipping in your favorite coffee or tea.

name: Tiramisù
description: Experience the exquisite layers of our Tiramisù, featuring delicate ladyfingers soaked in espresso and layered with mascarpone cheese, cocoa, and a touch of liqueur.

name: Cannoli
description: Delight in the classic Sicilian dessert, Cannoli, with its crisp pastry shell filled with sweet ricotta cheese, chocolate chips, and a sprinkle of powdered sugar.

name: Panettone
description: Savor the traditional Italian Panettone, a light and airy sweet bread studded with candied fruits and raisins, perfect for festive occasions.

name: Napoletano
description: Treat yourself to the irresistible Napoletano dessert, a heavenly combination of pastry layers, sweet ricotta, and candied fruit, all topped with a delicate glaze.

name: Bussolai
description: Enjoy our delicate Bussolai cookies, lightly sweetened and shaped into rings, a perfect accompaniment to your afternoon tea or coffee.

name: Sfogliatelle
description: Discover the flaky layers of our Sfogliatelle pastry, filled with creamy ricotta and a hint of citrus, creating a delightful sweet and tangy flavor.
